snippet: A U.S. senator from Alaska concerned about salmon fishing and tourism urged the State Department in a letter released on Monday to help ensure that Canadian metal mines are safe after a major spill of waste into waterways near the Alaska border....

headline.print_headline: Alaska Senator Urges Kerry to Help Make Canada Mines Safe
headline.main: Alaska Senator Urges Kerry to Help Make Canada Mines Safe

lead_paragraph: A U.S. senator from Alaska concerned about salmon fishing and tourism urged the State Department in a letter released on Monday to help ensure that Canadian metal mines are safe after a major spill of waste into waterways near the Alaska border.
